metadata.author: Deloitte
metadata.description: This rule idetifies when SCC service is enabled in GCP environment

ruleText:
rule GCP_SCC_service_enabled
{
//This rule need to be simulated in GCP environment********



  meta:
    author = "Deloitte"
    description = "This rule idetifies when SCC service is enabled in GCP environment"
    severity = "Medium"


  events:

  //SCC Enabled
    $e.metadata.event_type = "GENERIC_EVENT"
    $e.metadata.vendor_name = "Google"
    $e.metadata.log_type = "GCP_SECURITYCENTER_MISCONFIGURATION"
    $e.metadata.product_event_type = "DEFAULT_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_USED"
    $e.metadata.product_name = "Security Command Center"
    $e.security_result.detection_fields["state"] = "ACTIVE" 
    $e.target.application = "compute.googleapis.com"



  outcome:
    // For a multi-event rule an aggregation function is required
    // e.g., risk_score = max(0)
    // See https://cloud.google.com/chronicle/docs/detection/yara-l-2-0-overview#outcome_conditionals_example_rule
    $risk_score = 0

  condition:
    $e
}
